evidence_blocks.title: Relation of high-density lipoprotein cholesterol:apolipoprotein a-I ratio to progression of coronary atherosclerosis in statin-treated patients.

evidence_blocks.title: Natural human apoA-I mutations L141RPisa and L159RFIN alter HDL structure and functionality and promote atherosclerosis development in mice.
evidence_blocks.claim: Mutations in human apolipoprotein A-I (apoA-I) are associated with low high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol levels and pathological conditions such as premature atherosclerosis and amyloidosis.
